title: Feel so disappointed being offended whole game in norm
body: Last game maybe will be my last LOL game. A duo keep offending my race and my country whole game which is not acceptable. And no one gives a shit. Reporting system didn't work at all. The community just not like 4 years ago. Sigh.

replies.body:
That's what happens when you don't mute people on the internet.
Doesn't matter what game you play, you're going to encounter people like that. As in people. Not just the League community, but people in general that have access to the internet. 

Reporting system works fine, just not by everyone's standards. 
And no community no matter where you go to play will be the same.
how did they know your race or nationality ?
his name is in chinese pingyin.

So I won't bring race into this.
but, these are one of the things that happen, not everyone has an open mind, I still hate vegans to this day.
once again, it was your choice to make your username 温州一把（我咋他妈知道你在拼啥), If you expose your race, you should be willing to accept the fact that you and your race will be constantly berated in a game.
